When you see my logo, you know I snapped it! I've left my hometown behind to photograph the beautiful people of Los Santos. Come back the day after my livestreams to check out who I found!

Who's is running this blog?

Marie Av is a role playing character played by throwabae. throwabae is a lady who just wants to finally flaunt her newfound confidence.
